data.comment: Blackburn kick-off the first half - the match is underway!
Marcus Forss for Brentford has been booked by Oliver Langford and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 10, Barry Douglas (Blackburn) has received a first yellow card.
Daniel Ayala is replacing Scott Wharton for the away team.
Goal! Joe Rothwell gives Blackburn a 0-1 lead.
In the minute 27, At Griffin Park, Darragh Lenihan has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Vitaly Janelt (Brentford) has received a yellow card from Oliver Langford.
In the minute 36, An attacking Brentford player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
Darragh Lenihan (Blackburn) has been sent off!
The match is now all square at 1-1 thanks to a penalty from Ivan Toney.
Tony Mowbray (Blackburn) is making a second substitution, with John Buckley replacing Tom Trybull.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half is underway. Brentford with the kick-off.
Emiliano Marcondes is replacing Vitaly Janelt for Brentford at Griffin Park.
In the minute 46, Amari Bell is on a sub for Barry Douglas for Blackburn.
Joe Rothwell (Blackburn) gets a yellow card.
Blackburn's Bradley Johnson has been booked in London.
In the minute 60, Goal! Sergi Canos gives Brentford a 2-1 lead in London.
Blackburn make their fourth substitution with Jacob Davenport replacing Joe Rothwell.
The away team have replaced Adam Armstrong with Tyrhys Dolan. This is the fifth substitution made today by Tony Mowbray.
In the minute 70, Thomas Frank is making the team's second substitution at Griffin Park with Bryan Mbeumo replacing Marcus Forss.
The home team replace Sergi Canos with Tarique Fosu.
Brentford make their fourth substitution with Dominic Thompson replacing Rico Henry.
In the minute 82, Saman Ghoddos is replacing Joshua Da Silva for the home team.
Goal! Jacob Davenport levels the match at 2-2.
It's 2-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
Thomas Kaminski is booked for the away team.
